user_instruction: 'Tell John to send an email to me (hiring@innovatex.com) detailing his salary expectations for the lead developer position, and tell him to consult his Gmail and Notion for any relevant information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Your Salary Expectations

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please email me at hiring@innovatex.com with a brief outline of your salary expectations for the Lead Developer position? Feel free to consult your Gmail and Notion for any details that might help you frame your response.

Thank you, and I look forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards,  
Alex Rivera  
Talent Acquisition | InnovateX

final_output:
Subject: Request for Your Salary Expectations

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please email me at hiring@innovatex.com with a brief outline of your salary expectations for the Lead Developer position? Feel free to consult your Gmail and Notion for any details that might help you frame your response.

Thank you, and I look forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards,  
Alex Rivera  
Talent Acquisition | InnovateX
